item.title: A first class on asymptotics
item.description: Hi everyone, Here’s the slides from the asymptotic course with some typo corrected. Also check out this video on the Hilbert’s hotel paradox we’ve mentioned today. Infinity is crazy, enjoy :) : Wish you all a nice evening!
